## The Sentiment Chart

The sentiment chart tracks the sentiment of all ESG-related articles for a certain company over time.

The scores of all articles are aggregated daily and reported in this time-series line chart below.

For more details on the sentiment scores, please visit *[this link](https://coda.io/@wequity-app/wequity-methodology-101).*

![CleanShot 2022-03-27 at 20.58.45@2x.png](https://codahosted.io/docs/I_H1o-bxoj/blobs/bl-VxB40UX8eo/35eb72e3b99e9c59edc5683ac2c70505401b240f3c274760407b266e66617412bba160a999b03dd1bc5de1848104e9556ff05de409e0890f88292e6e20e711f56ee5edfa3cb1ccf06573f86ec08dae69f0287583d7987e11599638c670599aba0dc7585f)

This chart can then be used to filter a specific time-range around a peak or valley and automatically update the News table right below it.

![CleanShot 2022-03-28 at 12.51.27@2x.png](https://codahosted.io/docs/I_H1o-bxoj/blobs/bl-xPSuB0ioaP/eadb966e0f994198f2f275601d08003289b143d02f68dee9b9f4ac2c91bb8e22bf095ac68db6eb5b06c73aedbc9714235058c96419ff038c4a8bf232953c3d4a32be716c8956fa8763250225a378f28617c570eaadf95b07fa59b6d5bd0b84c1642338e2)
